text: My name is Ariel. Today we will talk about 50 daily routine sentences for work. Many people know English words,
but they cannot make simple sentences at work. If this happens to you, you are not alone. Today I will help you. We
will follow one workday. We will use easy words. We will use short sentences.
You can speak them every day. You can repeat them and you can feel more confident. Now imagine your morning. You
wake up, you say. I wake up early. I get out of bed. I make my bed. I wash my face. I brush my teeth. I take a shower.
I get dressed. I wear my work clothes. I comb my hair. I check the time. I feel ready. Then you go to the kitchen. You
say I make breakfast. I eat breakfast. I drink tea. I drink coffee. I drink water. I take my lunchbox. I pack my bag. I check my phone. I take my keys.
Then you leave home. You say, "I leave the house. I lock the door. I walk to the bus stop. I take the bus. I take the
train. I drive to work. I reach the office. I arrive on time. I enter the building. I say good morning. I greet my
co-workers. I smile. I sit at my desk.
Then work starts.
You say.
I turn on my computer. I open my email.
I check messages. I reply to emails. I make a to-do list. I start my tasks. I work on my project. I focus on my work.
I make a phone call. I answer a call. I attend a meeting. I listen carefully.
I take notes. I ask a question. I share an update. I finish one task. I start another task. I solve a problem. I ask
for help. I follow instructions. I check my work. I fix mistakes. I send the file. I meet a deadline. Then you take a
break, you say. I take a short break. I drink water. I stretch my body. I rest my eyes. I go back to work. Then lunchtime comes, you say. I take my
lunch break. I eat lunch. I sit quietly.
I talk a little. I feel relaxed.
Then you return to work. You say. I continue working. I complete my tasks. I update my manager. I plan for tomorrow.
Then the day ends, you say. I save my work. I shut down my computer. I clean my desk. I pack my bag. I say goodbye. I
leave the office. I go back home. I feel tired. I feel proud. I rest at home. I have dinner. I go to bed.
Now you have a full day in simple English. Please speak these sentences every day. Say them with your mouth. Say them slowly. Repeat them again and
again.
This is how your English becomes strong.
Do you want the next 1,000 words?
